====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|卜筮}} involves two different types of divination. The first is {{zh-l|卜}}, or {{zh-l|龜卜}}, which involves the use of {{zh-l|龜甲}} or {{zh-l|牛骨}}; the second is {{zh-l|筮}}, or {{zh-l|占筮}}, which involves the use of {{zh-l|蓍草}}.
